Proudly Serving

A playbook helping local governments build people-centered digital public services.

I currently serve as co-maintainer of Proudly Serving, a playbook helping local governments build people-centered digital public services. Proudly Serving aims to be an approachable, actionable resource with specific, practical advice local governments can take to make digital services work for everyone. To be published in 2023.
